name: Open Art - Free NFTs UI Kit
description:
Create stunning NFTs applications with bulletproof guidelines and thoughtful components. Its library contains more than 50+ components supporting Light & Dark Mode and 60+ ready to use mobile screens.


  • Super Fast Customization: Open Art comes up with variant components to help you easily create any screen with a few clicks.
  • Modern & Minimalistic User Interface: Open Art UI kit focus on minimal design. Bring the modern feel to your design, we build a system with perfect space, typography, and more.
